Single_Shot.help: A quick single shot from the Arachnos Sub-machinegun. Extremely accurate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Single_Shot.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Pummel.help: You can smash your opponents in close combat with the butt of your sub-machine gun to deal minor smashing damage. Pummel has a high chance to disorient your foe for a brief time. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Burst.help: Quickly fires a Burst of rounds at a single target at long range. Damage is average, but the fire rate is fast. Can also reduce the target's defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Burst.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

WS_Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.help: Launches a Grenade at long range from under the barrel of your Assault rifle. It explodes into a field of sticky webs which slow and can immobilize all foes within its radius. Recharge: Long
WS_Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.targetHelp: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.
WS_Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.attackerHit: You attempt to immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}!
WS_Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.victimHit: {PlayerSource} attempts to immobilize you with their {PowerName}!

Heavy_Burst.help: Fires a Heavy Burst of rounds at foes in a long cone in front of the user. Can also reduce the targets' defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT) Recharge: Medium
Heavy_Burst.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Bayonet.help: Your weapon includes a bayonet attachment which you can use to stab at your enemies for lethal damage as well as causing them to bleed losing health over time. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Medium

Venom_Grenade.help: This poisonous grenade causes toxic damage over time and weakens the resistance of all foes within the area of effect. NOTE: If you take this power you cannot also take the Crab Spider version. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Long
Venom_Grenade.targetHelp: The poisonous gas has severely weakened your resistance to attacks.

Frag_Grenade.help: Launches a Frag Grenade at long range from under the barrel of your rifle. The explosion from this grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back. Note: If you take this power, you cannot take the Crab Spider version. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Medium
Frag_Grenade.shortHelp: Ranged(Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG (Lethal/Smash), Foe Knockback
